channel.title: Private Brands on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Private Brands on FinanClub

item.title: M
item.description: score:45 Chances: Macy’s has announced the launch of State of Day, a new restwear, sleepwear and innerwear brand, which adds to the company’s momentum in reimagining its private brands portfolio. The company’s consistent battle with inflation may lead to bargain hunting and increased sales for discount retailer stocks, which could benefit Macy’s in the long run.
